entry.title: $1750 // Great Deal! Well Kept Spacious 1 Bed APT In Heart Astoria
entry.content:
This apartment is located just off Broadway / 3.5 blocks to R/M train station.
Really Great Deal !! Clean, Well Kept Apartment In Heart Of Astoria!

One very spacious room with hardwood floor accommodates a full size living room.
The second room is also spacious with hardwood floors and is a queen size bedroom.
Both of these rooms get flooded with sunlight!!!

There is a separate kitchen and additional nook (can be used as small dining area; desk area; storage cabinets etc.).

Full bathroom with window.

Two large closets, very deep for extra storage.

This sunny and cozy apartment has a lot of potential, great price!

Super short walk to Broadway R/M train station.
-or- less than 10 minute walk to N/W train.

Heat and Hot Water Included.

*Small Pet Negotiable*

Ref#:30400
Available Now
